title: Aggregate liability
context: ยง431:4-418 Aggregate liability. No one policy or subscriber as to such policy shall be assessed or be charged with an aggregate of contingent liability as to obligations incurred by a domestic reciprocal insurer in any one calendar year, in excess of the number of times the premium as stated in the policy, computed solely upon premium earned on such policy during that year. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
